General.Name: Pan Asia Environmental Protection Group Limited
General.Description: Pan Asia Environmental Protection Group Limited sells environmental protection (EP) products and equipment in the People's Republic of China. It operates in two segments, EP Products and Equipment, and EP Construction Engineering services. The company offers water treatment products and equipment for the treatment of industrial and urban waste water; and flue gas treatment products and equipment. It also undertakes EP construction engineering projects. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.
